Structs/FeatureStatus.html#/s:7Capable13.name: statusString
Structs/FeatureStatus.html#/s:7Capable13.abstract: The feature’s status: While most features can only have a status set to enabled or disabled, the ‘.largerText` feature offers the font scale set by the user.

Structs/Capable.html#/s:7CapableAAV9stat.name: statusMap
Structs/Capable.html#/s:7CapableAAV9stat.abstract: The statusMap property returns a dictionary of all features, that the Capable instance has been initialized with along with their current statuses. This object is compatible with most analytic SDKs such as Fabric Answers, Firebase Analytics, AppCenter Analytics, or HockeyApp.

Structs/Capable.html#/s:7CapableAAVABSay.name: init(withFeatures:)
Structs/Capable.html#/s:7CapableAAVABSay.abstract: Initializes the framework instance with a specified set of features. If no feature was provided, this defaults to all features available on the current platform.

Structs/Capable.html#/s:7CapableAAV16isF.name: isFeatureEnabled(feature:)
Structs/Capable.html#/s:7CapableAAV16isF.abstract: Provides information regarding the current status of a provided feature.

Structs/Capable.html.name: Capable
Structs/Capable.html.abstract: This class defines the main interface of the Capable framework.

Structs/FeatureStatus.html.name: FeatureStatus
Structs/FeatureStatus.html.abstract: Model class that describes the content of a Capable notification (see Notification.Name.CapableFeatureStatusDidChange)

Extensions/UIFont.html#/scaledFont(name:.name: scaledFont(name:size:)
Extensions/UIFont.html#/scaledFont(name:.abstract: Creates a scalable font with the given font name and reference font size.

Extensions/UIFont.html#/scaledSystemFont.name: scaledSystemFont(ofSize:)
Extensions/UIFont.html#/scaledSystemFont.abstract: Creates a scalable system font with a given reference font size.

Extensions/UIFont.html#/scaledBoldSystem.name: scaledBoldSystemFont(ofSize:)
Extensions/UIFont.html#/scaledBoldSystem.abstract: Creates a scalable bold system font with a given reference font size.

Extensions/UIFont.html#/scaledItalicSyst.name: scaledItalicSystemFont(ofSize:)
Extensions/UIFont.html#/scaledItalicSyst.abstract: Creates a scalable italic system font with a given reference font size.

Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.name: CapableFeatureStatusDidChange
Extensions/Notification/Name.html#/s:So1.abstract: Name of the notification that gets fired whenever an observed accessibility feature status changes.

Extensions/Notification/Name.html.name: Name
Extensions/Notification/Name.html.abstract: Extension that defines notification names provided by the Capable framework.

Extensions/UIFont.html.name: UIFont
Extensions/UIFont.html.abstract: Extension that adds functionality for creating scalable UIFont objects.

Enums/CapableFeature.html#/assistiveTouc.name: assistiveTouch
Enums/CapableFeature.html#/assistiveTouc.abstract: Menu that helps people with motor skill impairments to do certain actions or gestures by using a single tap.

Enums/CapableFeature.html#/guidedAccess.name: guidedAccess
Enums/CapableFeature.html#/guidedAccess.abstract: Restricts access to certain features of a single app to keep the user focused.

Enums/CapableFeature.html#/shakeToUndo.name: shakeToUndo
Enums/CapableFeature.html#/shakeToUndo.abstract: Deletes the last command by shaking the phone.

Enums/CapableFeature.html#/speakScreen.name: speakScreen
Enums/CapableFeature.html#/speakScreen.abstract: Reads out the content of the current screen.

Enums/CapableFeature.html#/s:7Capable0A7.name: differentiateWithoutColor
Enums/CapableFeature.html#/s:7Capable0A7.abstract: Helps color blind users to differentiate settings differently, e.g. by using shapes rather than colors.

Enums/CapableFeature.html#/s:7Capable0A7.name: increaseContrast
Enums/CapableFeature.html#/s:7Capable0A7.abstract: Increases contrast to make out text and interface elements.

Enums/CapableFeature.html#/grayscale.name: grayscale
Enums/CapableFeature.html#/grayscale.abstract: Makes the display more readable for color blind people by using gray tones instead of colors.

Enums/CapableFeature.html#/monoAudio.name: monoAudio
Enums/CapableFeature.html#/monoAudio.abstract: Merges stereo audio channels to help users that are hard of hearing or deaf in one ear.

Enums/CapableFeature.html#/s:7Capable0A7.name: invertColors
Enums/CapableFeature.html#/s:7Capable0A7.abstract: Helps people with low vision, color blindness, or sensitivity to brightness to read the display content.

Enums/CapableFeature.html#/s:7Capable0A7.name: reduceTransparency
Enums/CapableFeature.html#/s:7Capable0A7.abstract: Removes transparency from layers to make them readable for users with visual impairment.

Enums/CapableFeature.html#/s:7Capable0A7.name: switchControl
Enums/CapableFeature.html#/s:7Capable0A7.abstract: Allows users with limited mobility to control their device with the help of ability switches and other adaptive devices.

Enums/CapableFeature.html#/s:7Capable0A7.name: reduceMotion
Enums/CapableFeature.html#/s:7Capable0A7.abstract: Reduces animations to help users with motion sickness and epilepsy issues.

Enums/CapableFeature.html#/s:7Capable0A7.name: voiceOver
Enums/CapableFeature.html#/s:7Capable0A7.abstract: The screen reader available on Apple platforms.

Enums/CapableFeature.html#/s:7Capable0A7.name: allValues()
Enums/CapableFeature.html#/s:7Capable0A7.abstract: Returns an array containing all CapableFaeture types available on the current platform.

Enums/CapableFeature.html#/s:7Capable0A7.name: keys(forFeatures:)
Enums/CapableFeature.html#/s:7Capable0A7.abstract: Iterates through a given list of feature types and returns an array containing the feature names as strings.

Enums/CapableFeature.html.name: CapableFeature
Enums/CapableFeature.html.abstract: An enum specifying all features available on the current platform.
